Wednesday.name: Wednesday's child is full of woe
Wednesday.description: When a deliciusly wicked prank gets Wednesday expelled. Her parents ship her of to Nevermore Academy, the boarding school where they fell in love.

Wednesday.name: Woe is the loneliest number
Wednesday.description: The sheriff questions Wednesday about the night's strange happening. Later, Wednesday faces off against a fierce rival in the cutthroat Poe Cup race.

Wednesday.name: Friend or Woe
Wednesday.description: Wednesday stumbles on a secret society. During Outreach Day, Nevermore's outcasts mingle with Jericho's normies in Pilgrim World. Fudge, anyone?

Wednesday.name: Woe What a Night
Wednesday.description: Wednesday asks Xavier to the Rave'N dance, sparking Tyler's jealousy - but Thing's got something up his sleeve. Meanwhile, Eugene stakes out the cave.

Wednesday.name: You Reap What You Woe
Wednesday.description: During Parents Weekend, Wednesday digs into her family's past - and accidentally gets her dad arrested. Enid feels the pressure to 'wolf out.'

Wednesday.name: Quid Pro Woe
Wednesday.description: Wednesday's friends throw her a surprise birthday party. They mean well... but she'd much rather mark the miserable occasion by solving the murders.

Wednesday.name: If You Don't Woe Me by Now
Wednesday.description: Kooky Uncle Fester pays a visit and shares his theory about the monster. Wednesday begrudgingly agrees to a date with Tyler at Crackstone's crypt.

Wednesday.name: A Murder of Woes
Wednesday.description: Wednesday lands in troulbe whit Principal Weems, but that's just the start of her problems. To fight an ancient evil, she'll need all her friend's help.

The Witcher.name: The End's Beginning
The Witcher.description: Hostile townsfolk and a cunning mage greet Geralt in the town of Blaviken. Ciri finds her royal world upended when Nilfgaard sets its sights on Cintra.

The Witcher.name: Four Marks
The Witcher.description: Bullied and neglected, Yennefer accidentally finds a means of escape. Geralt's hunt for a so-called devil goes to hell. Ciri seeks safety in numbers.

The Witcher.name: Betrayer Moon
The Witcher.description: Geralt takes on another Witcher's unfinished business in a kingdom stalked by a ferocious beast. At a brutal cost, Yennefer forges a magical new future.

The Witcher.name: Of Banquets, Bastards and Burials
The Witcher.description: Against his better judgment, Geralt accompanies Jaskier to a royal ball. Ciri wanders into an enchanted forest. Yennefer tries to protect her charges.

The Witcher.name: Bottled
The Witcher.description: Heedless of warnings, Yennefer looks for a cure to restore what she's lost. Geralt inadvertently puts Jaskier in peril. The search for Ciri intensifies.

The Witcher.name: Rare Species
The Witcher.description: A mysterious man tries to entice Geralt to join a hunt for a rampaging dragon, a quest that attracts a familiar face. Ciri questions who she can trust.

The Witcher.name: Before a Fall
The Witcher.description: With the Continent at risk from Nilfgaard's rising power, Yennefer revisits her past, while Geralt reconsiders his obligation to the Law of Surprise.

The Witcher.name: Much More
The Witcher.description: A terrifying pack of foes lays Geralt low. Yennefer and her fellow mages prepare to fight back. A shaken Ciri depends on the kindness of a stranger.

The Witcher.name: A Grain of Truth
The Witcher.description: Geralt sets off with Ciri on a journey that leads him to an old friend. After the Battle of Sodden, Tissaia shows no mercy in her search for information.

The Witcher.name: Kaer Morhen
The Witcher.description: Seeking a safe place for Ciri, Geralt heads for home, but danger lurks everywhere - even Kaer Morhen. Yennefer's dreams could be the key to her freedom.

The Witcher.name: What Is Lost
The Witcher.description: Impatient with Geralt's methods, Ciri braves major obstacles to prove her mettle. Scheming and suspicion among the Brotherhood make Yennefer a target.

The Witcher.name: Redanian Intelligence
The Witcher.description: A guest at Kaer Morhen extends a guiding hand to Ciri- and an invitation to Geralt. On the run in Redania, Yennefer seeks safety below ground.

The Witcher.name: Turn Your Back
The Witcher.description: As a powerful mage joins the hunt for Ciri, she cuts a deal with Vesemir over his extraordinary discovery. Geralt explores the mystery of the monoliths.

The Witcher.name: Dear Friend...
The Witcher.description: A close friend is lost- and another found — as Geralt helps Ciri learn more about her power. Cahir warns Fringilla to focus on their primary mission.

The Witcher.name: Voleth Meir
The Witcher.description: Geralt turns to a humble bard for help, Yennefer realizes just how special Ciri is, and tensions rise on the eve of Emperor Emhyr's visit to Cintra.

The Witcher.name: Family
The Witcher.description: Geralt faces off with a demon targeting his nearest and dearest while the most powerful players on the Continent ramp up their pursuit of Ciri.

Manifest.name: Pilot
Manifest.description: Flight 828 arrives in New York with passengers who are unaware they've been missing for years as a mysterious phenomenon influences their behavior.

Manifest.name: Reentry
Manifest.description: The NSA interrogates the people on Flight 828 as they try to resume their lives. One passenger falls victim to a crime after speaking to the media.

Manifest.name: Turbulence
Manifest.description: Michaela visits Evie's parents, who struggle with their loss. Twin siblings Cal and Olive try to reconnect after five and a half years apart.

Manifest.name: Unclaimed Baggage
Manifest.description: Michaela misinterprets her latest vision, landing her ex-fiancé Jared in trouble. Ben and Saanvi seek out a flight attendant from Flight 828.

Manifest.name: Connecting Flights
Manifest.description: Flashbacks reveal how loved ones coped after Flight 828's disappearance. To escape the voice in his head, Ben goes on an adventure with Cal.

Manifest.name: Off Radar
Manifest.description: When Cal develops a fever and begins speaking another language, Ben sets out to find a cure by searching for another passenger from the plane.

Manifest.name: S.N.A.F.U.
Manifest.description: Ben investigates the whereabouts of 11 missing passengers from Flight 828. After her latest Calling, Michaela makes a shocking discovery.

Manifest.name: Point of No Return
Manifest.description: Ben finds an unlikely partner in NSA Director Vance while locating the missing passengers. Michaela has a strange Calling and Cal goes back to school.

Manifest.name: Dead Reckoning
Manifest.description: As Ben and Michaela race to save the other missing passengers, their risky rescue mission takes an unexpected turn.

Manifest.name: Crosswinds
Manifest.description: Mourning the loss of an ally, Ben forms a new alliance to help identify a shadowy figure who may be responsible for the missing passengers.

Manifest.name: Contrails
Manifest.description: Cal's Calling sends Ben to help the captain of Flight 828, who is desperate to prove that he wasn't responsible for the plane's disappearance.

Manifest.name: Vanishing Point
Manifest.description: When Cal goes missing, Grace and Ben head to upstate New York to find him as a mysterious hiker appears. Michaela confronts Autumn.

Manifest.name: Cleared for Approach
Manifest.description: Michaela digs deeper for more information on Zeke. Jared investigates a man who runs a conspiracy website about the Flight 828 passengers.

Manifest.name: Upgrade
Manifest.description: Saanvi meets a member of a group that believes the Flight 828 passengers can perform miracles. Cal and Zeke have ominous Callings.

Manifest.name: Hard Landing
Manifest.description: During a police investigation, Michaela crosses paths with a man who raises questions among the group. Saanvi struggles to recover after her ordeal.

Manifest.name: Estimated Time of Departure
Manifest.description: Michaela and Ben try to stop Griffin, who threatens to reveal what he knows about the Callings, as a deadline looms for all the passengers.

The Queen's Gambit.name: Openings
The Queen's Gambit.description: Sent to an orphanage at age 9, Beth develops an uncanny knack for chess and a growing dependence on the green tranquilizers given to the children.

The Queen's Gambit.name: Exchanges
The Queen's Gambit.description: Suddenly plunged into a confusing new life in suburbia, teenage Beth studies her high school classmates and hatches a plan to enter a chess tournament.

The Queen's Gambit.name: Doubled Pawns
The Queen's Gambit.description: The trip to Cincinnati launches Beth and her mother into a whirlwind of travel and press coverage. Beth sets her sights on the U.S. Open in Las Vegas.

The Queen's Gambit.name: Middle Game
The Queen's Gambit.description: Russian class opens the door to a new social scene. In Mexico City, Beth meets the intimidating Borgov, while her mother cozies up to a pen pal.

The Queen's Gambit.name: Fork
The Queen's Gambit.description: Back home in Kentucky, a shaken Beth reconnects with a former opponent who offers to help sharpen her game ahead of the U.S. Championship.

The Queen's Gambit.name: Adjournment
The Queen's Gambit.description: After training with Benny in New York, Beth heads to Paris for her rematch with Borgov. But a wild night sends her into a self-destructive spiral.

The Queen's Gambit.name: End Game
The Queen's Gambit.description: A visit from an old friend forces Beth to reckon with her past and rethink her priorities — just in time for the biggest match of her life.
